desktop.title: Pricing
desktop.intro: Pair offers simple pricing for Free, Team, and Enterprise customers. For custom solutions of ≈100,000 Pair URLs or more per month, please contact customer@pairurl.com.

sections.content:
10 Pair Public URLs per month.
• Public Pair URLs
• 100 Builds Per Month
• Email Support

1,000 Pair URLs per month.
• Private Pair URLs
• 1,000 Builds Per Month
• Slack Support

10,000 Pair URLs per month.
• Private Pair URLs
• 1,0000 Builds Per Month
• PM Support
